string-array.item: CREATE TABLE `scenery` ( `sceneryID` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NULL, `province` varchar(255) NULL, `city` varchar(255) NULL, `area` varchar(255) NULL, `level` varchar(255) NULL, `quality` varchar(255) NULL, `description` MEDIUMTEXT NULL, `website` varchar(512) NULL, `symbolImage` varchar(512) NULL, `openTime` varchar(255) NULL, `closeTime` varchar(255) NULL, `price` varchar(255) NULL, `suggest` varchar(255) NULL, `season` varchar(255) NULL, `type` varchar(255) NULL, `longitude` decimal(18,13) NULL, `latitude` decimal(18,13) NULL, `precise` integer NULL, `confidence` integer NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`sceneryID`) );

CREATE TABLE `sceneryImages` ( `sceneryID` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `imageID` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `imageUrl` varchar(255) NULL, `imageName` varchar(255) NULL, `imageDesc` varchar(255) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`sceneryID`, `imageID`) );
ALTER TABLE `sceneryImages` ADD CONSTRAINT `images-scenery` FOREIGN KEY (`sceneryID`) REFERENCES `scenery` (`sceneryID`);
